categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Semma Waskor was a female captain in the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, Waskor was assigned to be a "watchdog" for Inferno Squad agent Iden Versio, who had committed a false act of treason as part of a ploy to infiltrate the Partisan remnant cell the Dreamers. On Vardos, Waskor accompanied Versio as her copilot, until she was severely injured in a tram accident.
